2017-12-01.name: Itazura Majo to Nemuranai Machi
2017-12-01.desc:
The story is set in New York which is lit up with Christmas lights. Tokyo Metropolitan Police officer Kido Akari is directing traffic while on her international exchange training program, when a witch-like character pulls a "Christmas Party" prank. Just before a runaway trailer truck smashes into Akari, a mysterious girl suddenly appears and shouts, "I'm going to protect New York and Akari!"

Source: ANN

2017-12-02.name: Donten ni Warau: Gaiden
2017-12-02.desc:
The time is the end of Samurai era (Edo) and the new Meiji government is founded in Japan. Three young brothers, Tenka, Soramaru, Chutaro who are the guardian of Kumou shrine stand up to prevent the "Orochi" from coming back to life every 300 years to save the country. It's one year after the great battle against the "Orochi" (gigantic snake).

The truth behind the curse, the reason behind the feud between Tenka and Kumou, and story of their parents were killed gets revealed for the first time.

Source: shochikufilms

2017-12-02.desc:

2017-12-16.name: Eiga Youkai Watch: Shadow Side - Oni Ou no Fukkatsu
2017-12-16.desc:
There used to be a boy who could control youkai with a mysterious watch. However, he became unable to see youkai when he became an adult. With the boy's duties finished, the watch was buried away in space-time. Then 30 years later, quiet everyday life comes to an end as a fateful day begins with a comet drawing near. The terrible youkai virus Onimaro infects people's malevolent intentions and spreads infinitely. The one chosen by the youkai watch is the one who can save humanity from its crisis. The bond between humans and youkai may be recovered with the attainment of a new youkai watch.

Source: ANN

2017-12-19.name: Panda no Blues
2017-12-19.desc: Official music for Panda no Blues written and performed by the band MIRChee.

2017-12-22.name: Nekopara
2017-12-22.desc:
Minazuki Kashou, the son of a long line of Japanese confection makers moved out to open his own shop "La Soleil" as a patisserie.

But upon moving out, hidden amongst his things were two of the catgirls, Chocola and Vanilla, that the family had been raising. When he tried to send them back, they begged and pleaded until he gave in and now they've opened La Soleil together.

With two catgirls who really, REALLY love their master trying their very best and occasionally failing -- a heartful comedy opens for business!

Source: Steam

2017-12-25.name: Kako Pad: Nagaoka Hanabi Monogatari
2017-12-25.desc: Note: The thirteenth and fourteenth episodes were released on December 23 on Blu-ray discs in regular and limited-edition versions. The fifteenth episode was bundled with the sixth limited-edition manga volume.

2017-12-26.name: Yuuwaku Office Lover 2
2017-12-26.desc: Note: Bundled with the limited edition of the fifth compiled manga volume.

2017-12-28.name: Zhu Zhu Xia: Chao Xing Meng Chong 4
2017-12-28.desc:
Keifuku-san features the adventures of a young girl in a railway conductor uniform and a floating manta ray as they explore an otherworldly space.

Source: crunchyroll

2017-12-29.name: Wu Geng Ji II: Tianqi
2017-12-29.desc:
That is a place further than the universe...

Tamaki Mari, also called Kimari by her friends, is a second-year high school student who wants to make the most out of her school years but never really gets around to starting anything. When her schoolmate Kobuchizawa Shirase tells her about her resolution to go to the South Pole, Kimari is moved by her tenacity and decides to go with her...

Source: Tokyo Otaku Mode

Note: The first two episodes received an early screening at a special event held at Cinema Sunshine Ikebukuro on 27.12.2017. Also the first episode received a special preliminary delivery on dAnime Store on 28.12.2017 (limited to 500 viewers), on NicoNico Live on 29.12.2017 and on AbemaTV on 30.12.2017. The regular TV broadcast started on 02.01.2018.

2017-12-31.name: Emiya-san Chi no Kyou no Gohan
2017-12-31.desc:
* Based on TAa's comedy cooking seinen manga, a spin-off in the Fate/Stay Night universe.

The story revolves around the delicious, beautiful cuisine that the Emiya family enjoy from day to day, no matter what the season is.

Source: ANN

Note: The first episode received a special air during "Fate Project New Year's Eve TV Special 2017" on 31.12.2017. The regular distribution started on 25.01.2018.

2017-12-31.name: Fate/Grand Order: Moonlight/Lostroom
2017-12-31.desc:
* Based on the Japanese smartphone role-playing game created by Type-Moon.

There is a "Lost Room" where you can find what was lost - or those who lost. This room, which belongs to no one, lies forgotten in a corner of Chaldea.

Source: ANN
